name: Bartdegeus.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome!
Welcome to my GitHub pages

### Assignment 1
[Assignment 1](https://bartdegeus.github.io/assignment-1) is my CV.

### Assignment 2
[Assignment 2](http://bartdegeus.github.io/assignment-2-html/assignment-2.html) is an old assignment from the Seminar Develoment & Growth in the MSc Economics programme. This version was typed up in emacs following LaTeX markup and then converted into HTML using the 'htlatex' command.

[This presentation](http://bartdegeus.github.io/assignment-2-slides/presentation.html) is an excerpt of the assignment. As this is but a selection, its contents will make only a limited amount of sense. This version was created in Markdown and converted using the reveal.js suite (credits to [hakimel](https://github.com/hakimel/reveal.js)) via pandoc. 

### Assignment 3
A link will be placed here to Assignment 3 before April 13
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
